name: MotherMayI
0:
”Alexa, play Mother May I”
”May I take 3 steps?”
”How many steps can I take?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mother may i
des: Play the classic kid's game of Mother May I with Alexa! Start up a game by simply saying "Alexa, play Mother May I". Once the game is set up, each player takes turns asking 'Mother' if they can take a number of steps. Be careful though, the larger the number of steps, the less likely Mother will approve!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
